clues: Had complex political and romantic alliances with Julius Caesar and Mark Antony to protect her kingdom.
According to popular belief, she committed suicide by allowing an asp (Egyptian cobra) to bite her.
Last active ruler of the Ptolemaic Kingdom of Egypt, effectively ending the Hellenistic period.

History.answer: Napoleon Bonaparte, Emperor of the French
clues: Crowned himself Emperor of the French in a lavish ceremony at Notre Dame de Paris in 1804.
Newton's work described this fundamental force that governs the motion of celestial bodies and objects on Earth.
Double helix structure discovered by Watson and Crick, revolutionizing our understanding of genetics.
